attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can the same people sit on boards for planning, funding and other schemes that could give rise to a conflict of interest; particularly when they own a business that could get funding and/or are masons.  The ordinary people want a say in what happens to funding in the area as the council seem to give it to the same people/streets time and time again and the small business peoople are losing out and being destroyed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
